channel.title: XPStrength - a very useful Bukkit plugin
channel.description:
Here's a plugin that I worked on, it's called XPStrength. It'll be useful for pretty much any server there is.
To sum it up: it makes a player more powerful depending on their experience level. The bonuses, and their level bounds are configurable by the administrators. It's also got a fully customisable language system.
[center][size=24pt]You can find it [url=http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/xpstrength/]here[/url][/size][/center]
